text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Yes!!! Cooper needs to go along with the monuments that he allowed to be taken down! He allowed all the protesting in Charlotte and wasn't concerned about the Coronavirus because protesting was legal???!!  All of his decisions throughout this pandemic has shown he is unworthy!!!
